name: 2 squared prototype
description:
this is a short prototype of my game called 2 squared

contact: denveraalders@gmail.com for bugs and isues

you need to download buildbox to try the game

what is the game about:

- it is a coop game for 2 players or less

- it is has no ads or purchases

- it is a platformer 

- it is also a shooter

it would really support me if you'd give my game an honest review.
